ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Multiple SDO/AIA Data Products at LMSAL
ResourceHeader.Description: Lockheed Martin Solar and Astrophysics Laboratory (LMSAL) provides multiple access paths to a variety of SDO (Solar Dynamics Observatory)/AIA (Atmospheric Imaging Assembly) digital and display solar images and movies, as well as to tools (e.g., the Heliophysics Events Knowledgebase, HEK) for selecting and viewing data. Data include full-disk, 1-arcsec-resolution solar images taken in each of 10 UV/EUV wavelengths every 10 seconds.

AccessURL.Name: VSO path to SDO data
AccessURL.Description: VSO path to JSOC-resident SDO HMI and AIA data files; JSOC is Joint Science Operations Center at Stanford U.
